original_name: Girls' Generation and the Dangerous Boys
plot: Girls' Generation meets up with five trouble making boys. They split into teams and try to make each of the boys become more respectable.
plot_en: Girls' Generation meets up with five trouble making boys. They split into teams and try to make each of the boys become more respectable.
plot_es: Girls' Generation meets up with five trouble making boys. They split into teams and try to make each of the boys become more respectable.
title: Girls' Generation and the Dangerous Boys
